707252f-a.text:
Walton St., Ihroop Ave. to B'way., B'klyn.

707045f-a.title: Brooklyn: Throop Ave. - Walton St.
707045f-a.text:
17-31 Throop Ave., north side, at, adjoining and west of Walton Street.
A view of the Beth Sar Sholom, a Jewish Mission.
April 20, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
